channel.title: Planet+AI Art
channel.description: inspiring innovators locally and globally through planetary images.

item.title: Return Capsule
item.description:
Return Capsule
by pwang27@utk.edu

This submission is for the 2022 Planet+AI Art Challenge themed on Imagining Mars Sample Return.

NASA’s images used in this artwork:

  1. Mars Earth Entry System Aeroshell at Entry https://mars.nasa.gov/resources/27054/mars-earth-entry-system-aeroshell-at-entry/. The Mars Earth Entry System for the Mars Sample Return will contain the orbiting sample inside a disk-shaped vehicle with a heat shield for safe entry through the Earth’s atmosphere.
